org.nd4j.parameterserver.background

Class BackgroundDaemonStarter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.parameterserver.background.BackgroundDaemonStarter

  • public class BackgroundDaemonStarter
extends java.lang.Object
    Start background daemons for tests Credit to: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/636367/executing-a-java-application-in-a-separate-process

        Exec a java process in the background
        Parameters:

        mediaDriverDirectory - the media driver directory to use
        args - the args to use (can be null)
